todos.title: Testing app with particle bg
todos.memo: How the hell did the particle background end up in front of the app when it is rendered first. I thought they were rendered in layers fml

todos.title: So now my alerts are not working correctly
todos.memo: Despite updating the state to clear the alerts, the alerts persist.
todos.addr: In my localhost of death and depression

todos.title: Raiders got lucky and won
todos.memo: Seriously, what were the Pats thinking? Literally running the ball was enough to get them in field goal position. I guess with about 10 seconds left, they were not confident that they were close enough to try a field goal.
